EmailTemplate.subject: DOCTOR EVIDENCE DOC LABEL TRAINING INVITATION
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|Doctor Evidence Upcoming DOC Search Trainings|*
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, You now have access to DOC Label, Doctor Evidence’s easy-to-use web-based labeling platform, a centralized platform for structured and unstructured data contained in US and UK physician labels, patient medication guides and patient information leaflets.
You are invited to attend a training to learn how to use DOC Label to: Search, browse, and compare labels with simple or complex keywords Create automatic alerts View side-by-side results of multiple labels in an interactive search environment Access all label versions and related agency communications for each compound Export results to Word, Excel, or HTML SCHEDULE: 27 March 2018 | 10-11 AM EST 4 April 2018 | 11 AM -12 PM EST 12 April 2018 | 10-11 AM EST |
Please respond to this invitation with the date of the training you would like to attend, or contact me for a private training at your convenience. I’ve attached a short slide outlining how this state of the art technology solution can bring increased efficiency and cost savings to your department..
Kind Regards, Ash Srivastava DOC Label Associate Doctor Evidence +1 (760) 221-4845
